metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8870 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in tools/bmp2tiff.c in LibTIFF before 4.0.4 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read), orpossibly obtain sensitive information from process memory, via craftedwidth and length values in RLE4 or RLE8 data in a BMP file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8870` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1').
